Message.Title: The New Message Board Format Sucks!
Message.Msg: I clicked on the banner and told them the existing format is ok. And if they have heard about "new coke" and why old habbits die hard. Add a spell check.

Message.Title: Yes, new format SUCKs big time!!!!!!
New message board. You're kidding us, right?
Message.Msg: You've made mistakes in the past. All forgiven. This "new msg board" will cause me to go back to Google if you insist on implementing this innovation.

Topic.Title: New message board. You're kidding us, right?
